Container.Name: cross-seed
Container.Overview:
Fully-automatic cross-seeding with Jackett
A sample configuration file can be found here: https://github.com/cross-seed/cross-seed/blob/master/src/config.template.docker.cjs
https://github.com/cross-seed/cross-seed https://hub.docker.com/r/mmgoodnow/cross-seed/
Container.Changes: ### 2023-01-28 - Disable Privileged flag ### 2022-08-18 - Updated support URL ### 2021-09-18 - Initial template release.

Config.Name: config
Config.Description: Folder where your config file will live. Default config can be found here: https://github.com/cross-seed/cross-seed/blob/master/src/config.template.docker.cjs rebname to config.js.

Config.Name: Input
Config.Description: Folder where your current torrents are located.
